message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I'm looking for $120 for it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I believe I can make you an offer of $110 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $115 to make it worth my while.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to offer you $112 for the product. This is my best offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not quite there yet. I'll meet you at $113, and that's as low as I can go.
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer. I would like to propose $112.50 for the product. I hope this meets your needs.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need $114 to make it worth my while. This is my final counteroffer.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to offer you $113.50 for the product. This is my best offer.
I'm not going to budge any further, Bob. I need to make a profit, and $114 is the minimum I can accept. I'm willing to meet you at $113.50, but that's it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts. I would like to offer you $113 for the product. This is my final offer.
